about_the_game:
It's the Soundtrack of WILL: A Wonderful World, in FLAC format.
The other bgm are not original so they are included in this soundtrack.

Tracklist:

  • 01 Ω2πⱯ
  • 02 Chains
  • 03 Chains Instrumental
  • 04 Chains Piano
  • 05 Lost Memories
  • 06 New Life
  • 07 Lost Memories (MUSYNX.edit)
